cleaned_text: Recent data from the CDC shows that non-COVID-19 deaths among Americans ages 18 to 49 have increased dramatically since 2020. Why is this happening? Is it connected to the federal government's mass vaccination program? We sat down with Dr. Ryan Cole, an American pathologist and founder of Cole Diagnostics, to discuss several potential reasons behind this surge in deaths—as well as how the deeply entrenched financial ties within the medical industry lead to a lack of transparency.
